sentences.english: They are currently in the process of piloting two programs aimed at getting families outdoors.
sentences.chinese: 他们最近还在实施另两个旨在让家庭走向户外的项目。

sentences.english: Could you put in a garden with some outdoor reading space?
sentences.chinese: 你们能把一些户外阅读空间建立在花园里吗？
户外野炊经常开始得很慢。

sentences.english: Do some out-of-door exercise every morning.
sentences.chinese: 每天早上举办一些户外锤炼。

sentences.english: A golf course is nothing but a poolroom moved outdoors.
sentences.chinese: 不，高尔夫球场不过是一个会动的户外台。

sentences.english: Early paintings depict figures using outdoor furniture often resembling more natural rock formations.
sentences.chinese: 早期绘画中描绘的户外家俱多呈自然石形。

sentences.english: The Loggia overlooks the cactus garden and outdoor fireplace.
sentences.chinese: 长廊眺望仙人掌花园和户外壁炉。

sentences.english: The outdoor fireplace makes for a very romantic place to entertain.
sentences.chinese: 户外壁炉是非常浪漫的待客地方。

sentences.english: Can Bear hardships and hard work, healthly and strong, could adapt aloft operation outdoors.
sentences.chinese: 吃苦耐劳，身体健硕，适应户外高空操作设备。

sentences.english: He is an outdoorsy type of person.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个喜爱户外活动类型的人。

sentences.english: Relax in the patio furniture until you get kicked out.
sentences.chinese: 坐在户外家具用品上小憩，直至被踢。

sentences.english: Finally the weather warmed, and Arnoldus was able to sit outside.
sentences.chinese: 终于，天气转暖，阿诺尔德斯也能到户外坐坐了。

sentences.english: Field hockey is an outdoor game similar to soccer.
sentences.chinese: 曲棍球是类似于英式足球的户外体育比赛。

sentences.english: He ought to go to outdoors for fresh airs .
sentences.chinese: 他应当去户外呼吸呼吸新鲜空气。

sentences.english: That outdoor job is the one after his own heart.
sentences.chinese: 这份户外工作正中他的下怀。

sentences.english: Observing and thinking characteristics of outdoor medias devel.
sentences.chinese: 户外媒体是近年来我国广告业增长最快的市场。

definition: to ride (a bicycle, horse, motorbike etc)/cycling/horseback riding/motorbike riding/a ride/CL:次[ci4]
to run/to jog/(military) to march at the double
